project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that retrieves current weather information for a specified city using a public API. The program will display temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement API call to fetch weather data
Parse and extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions from the API response
Format the output for terminal display
Write tests for fetching and parsing the weather information
Execute tests to ensure API call and parsing work correctly
